previews.name: thor
previews.description:
**Note:** The `team_reviewers` parameter is currently available for developers to preview. Please see the [blog post](/changes/2017-07-26-team-review-request-thor-preview) for full details.

To use this parameter during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](/enterprise/2.12/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.thor-preview+json

```

params.name: reviewers
params.description: An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

params.name: team_reviewers
params.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.
